briefdescription.para: The Kerbal reference for this portrait (for EVA kerbals)
The Kerbal reference for this portrait (for IVA kerbals)
Returns the ProtoCrewMember for either the Kerbal or KerbalEVA reference.

parameterdescription.para: Kerbal reference. Can Be null. But if null KerbalEVA must be passed in.
KerbalEVA reference. Can be null. But if null Kerbal must be passed in.

inbodydescription.para: < update once to avoid a weird first frame
